backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles and diary entries with access control, supporting CRUD-like operations including timestamp‑based deletion.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing requirements, affected files, and components for delete-behavior fixes and backend delete API integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all frontend diary, UI, and utility components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH theme variables for light/dark modes and global background/foreground tokens.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading the React app and setting the title to Unsaid Echoe.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup, loading states, and rendering the diary screen within a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query-cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/InlineStatus.tsx: Inline loading, error, and empty UI component with skeleton variant for diary entry placeholders.
frontend/src/components/LockedScreen.tsx: Unauthenticated landing screen showing app branding and sign‑in prompt.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile creation form allowing new users to submit a name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/ThemeSwitcher.ts: Dropdown for selecting between six visual themes using next‑themes.
Editor component for creating or modifying diary entries, handling text, photo uploads, color tags, and save/delete actions.
frontend/src/features/diary/DiaryList.ts: Displays a scrollable list of diary entries with previews, timestamps, and color tags, allowing selection by timestamp.
Main diary UI combining entry list, editor, and header, managing entry selection and creation state.
frontend/src/features/diary/EntryColorPi: Color selection UI offering preset color options for diary entries.
frontend/src/features/diary/EntryColorTa: Renders a small colored circle indicating an entry's color tag.
frontend/src/features/diary/hooks/useDia: React Query hook to fetch all diary entries using the backend actor.
Mutation hooks for adding and deleting diary entries, invalidating cached queries on success.
frontend/src/features/diary/PhotoAttachm: Handles image file selection, validation, previewing, and removal for diary photo attachments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity state, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and update the current user's profile via an actor, with cache invalidation on save.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and multiple theme color variables for light, dark, ocean, and sunset modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a cn utility that merges Tailwind and conditional class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query and hash routing with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing diary app features, issues, and requirements tracking.
